<title level="1" right="Rules">[Tremorsense](/Rules.aspx?ID=2413)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 433 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Tremorsense allows a creature to feel the vibrations through a solid surface caused by movement. It is usually an imprecise sense with a limited range (listed in the ability). Tremorsense functions only if the detecting creature is on the same surface as the subject, and only if the subject is moving along (or [burrowing](/Actions.aspx?ID=2310) through) the surface.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
